meanings.definition: The study or theory of liturgical practices.
meanings.sent1: In her liturgiologies class, Sarah learned about different church ceremonies.
meanings.sent2: The professor's liturgiologies research focused on the history of religious rituals.
meanings.sent3: The students found humor in the complexity of liturgiologies theories.
meanings.sent4: Exploring liturgiologies was like unraveling a tapestry of ancient traditions.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on liturgiologies made the subject come alive with vivid descriptions.

meanings.definition: A book or collection of liturgical forms and rituals.
meanings.sent1: The priest carried the liturgiologies to the altar for the morning service.
meanings.sent2: The liturgiologies contained the prayers and hymns for the Sunday mass.
meanings.sent3: The old liturgiologies was so worn that the pages stuck together.
meanings.sent4: The liturgiologies was a treasure trove of ancient traditions waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The intricate illustrations in the liturgiologies brought the rituals to life.
